gobblin.runtime.api

Interface EventMetadataGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoopEventMetadataGenerator

    public interface EventMetadataGenerator
    For generating additional event metadata to associate with an event.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> getMetadata(JobContext jobContext, EventName eventName)
      Generate a map of additional metadata for the specified event name.

    • Method Detail

      • getMetadata

        Map<String,String> getMetadata(JobContext jobContext,
                               EventName eventName)
        Generate a map of additional metadata for the specified event name.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the event name used to determine which additional metadata should be emitted
        Returns:
        Map with the additional metadata
